attributes.action: ensure that criminal proceedings are taken against MP's and Peers who are guilty of abusing the expenses facility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the case of an ex-labour minister claiming Mortgage interest on an already paid mortgage is clearly a criminal offence and should be treated as such.
it is the prime minister who should instigate the proceedings

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
